Package ch.decent.sdk.model.operation

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccountCreateOperation
    Request to create account operation constructor
    AccountUpdateOperation
    Request to account update operation constructor
    AddOrUpdateContentOperation
    Request to submit content operation constructor
    AssetClaimFeesOperation
    Claim fees operation constructor. Claim funds from asset pool, only the asset issuer can clam.
    AssetCreateOperation
    Create Asset operation constructor.
    AssetFundPoolsOperation
    Fund asset pool operation constructor. Any account can fund a pool.
    AssetIssueOperation
    Issue asset operation constructor. Only the issuer of the asset can issue some funds until maxSupply is reached.
    AssetPublishFeedOperation
    skip, cannot create monitored asset, also only miner account can publish feeds asset_create_op has account_id_type fee_payer()const { return monitored_asset_opts.valid() ? account_id_type() : issuer; } therefore throws Missing Active Authority 1.2.0
    AssetReserveOperation
    Reserve funds operation constructor. Return issued funds to the issuer of the asset.
    AssetUpdateAdvancedOperation
    Update advanced options for the asset.
    AssetUpdateMonitoredOperation
    skip, cannot create asset_create_op has account_id_type fee_payer()const { return monitored_asset_opts.valid() ? account_id_type() : issuer; } therefore throws Missing Active Authority 1.2.0
